name: Cinder
headline: Cinder | Responsible AI, Trust & Safety, and Data Labeling At Scale
description: From content moderation to responsible AI, Cinder empowers businesses to orchestrate and automate digital safety at scale. Cinder was founded to help organizations foster safe online spaces for everyone. Our platform empowers companies from start-ups to enterprises with end-to-end capabilities to mitigate harm, investigate abuse, and produce trustworthy and reliable AI outcomes. Building your world-class company means keeping your users and community safe—Cinder unlocks faster growth by making safety easy. We work with customers in every industry from frontier AI labs to e-commerce and social media.

founders.name: Glen Wise, Founder
founders.description: After graduating from Carnegie Mellon, Glen joined Facebook as a security engineer to lead the build out of their community threat intelligence platform, working directly with Phil Brennan for over 3 years. Glen started Cinder in 2021 to help other companies solve similar trust and safety problems.

founders.name: Phil Brennan, Founder
founders.description: Phil joined Facebook in 2017 to build out their community threat intelligence team, after running counterterrorism units for the US government. Phil worked with Glen Wise for several years at Facebook before joining him to co-found Cinder.

# The operating system for safety
From content moderation to responsible AI, Cinder empowers businesses to orchestrate and automate digital safety at scale.
## Cinder is trusted by

## Align your data, team, and technology seamlessly in one integrated workflow.
Responsible AI
Platform Integrity
Data Compliance
Turn policies into actionable enforcement in seconds. Minimize time to resolution with AI-driven automations backed by human judgement. Track, audit, and quality-check every decision. All without filing a single engineering ticket.No more toggling between tabs, spreadsheets, and apps. No more SQL. No more guesswork.One integrated platform to power your business.
## Integrated, Accountable, and Intelligent Decision Making
Modern enterprises use massive amounts of data that integrate human and automated decisions. Cinder streamlines the entire process to ensure the consistency, accuracy, and safety of mission-critical decisions to drive your product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bcc76deb3d0a0531bdc65_cog.svg)
Cross-functional Solutions
Keeping data clean, organized, and actionable is essential to effectiveness. Cinder's flexible schema, intuitive policies, and configurable automations align your mission, your data, and your decision making. Trigger enforcement actions for Trust & Safety, fine-tune a model, or do both simultaneously.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bcc76f3eee51a7d759fab_limited.svg)
AI Enhanced Workflows
Modern content moderation requires putting your workflows on a single pane of glass. Cinder integrates human and automated processes to build, test, and manage complex workflows that require AI speed and scale balanced with human judgment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bcc7686ab236205a8e259_inef.svg)
Across The Board Accountability
Whether it's assessing human-in-the-loop AI deployments, managing review teams, or preparing regulatory documentation, Cinder offers a complete suite of tactical, operational, and strategic data to ensure compliance and accountability.
CAPABILITIES
## Manage All Your Workflows in One Platform
Point solutions isolate data and processes in disparate tools. Cinder integrates your workflows in a single source of truth. Manage policies, data labeling, and AI-backed automations all in Cinder.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Reduce inefficiency by simplifying your toolset. Centralize your operations into one platform for context-informed decisions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Alignment between automated systems and human decisions are critical to the complexity of safety at scale. Cinder lets you build and deploy combined workflows in minutes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Integrated operations means integrated output data. Track volumes, accuracy, and effectiveness in real-time - and get compliance data for free as you do so.
CAPABILITIES
## Instantly Adapt to New Risks and Opportunities
Update work streams without overloading engineering. Trust at the speed of innovation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Threat actors adapt. Don't fall behind. Build and deploy new policies, workflows, and queues without a single line of code, because safety does not wait for bureaucracy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
New product UI? No problem. Update schema, renderers for human review, and automations in moments. Cinder lets you move at the speed of the market.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Empower engineering to ship more product. Use data labeled in Cinder to build better AI and design for stronger security—all without losing focus on the bottom line.
Capabilities
## Make Smarter Decisions with Integrated Data
Transform engineering with real-time data from Cinder to drive strategic Trust & Safety implementations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Cinder's API for Trust and Safety data provides a powerful tool for engineering teams to build new detection models, innovate better interventions, and drive product development.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Seamlessly connect into third-party AI tools, use your own models, or easily develop new models in Cinder. Harness data curated in real-time to benchmark your models, constantly improve, and iterate.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Quality control is central to product development and monitoring. Benchmark AI performance and human labelers in real-time to stay on time and on target.
## Built for security, scale, and flexible control. Cinder is designed to protect Trust and Safety's most sensitive data. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e78a36407534ea4de4_soc%202.svg)
soc 2 type II 
Cinder's data security controls support Trust and Safety teams at advanced AI labs, marketplaces, and content platforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e5f0e2bb267b7506ca_sso.svg)
Robust Access Management
Integrate Cinder with your existing SSO, including support for Okta, Azure AD, OpenID and other protocols. Customizable permissions regulate access to sensitive data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e5e77100ec0eb35b71_self.svg)
cloud Native
Run Cinder as SaaS that scales with your needs. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e501bf1b25b219be7b_audit.svg)
audit logs
Audit and understand how your team uses Cinder with built-in Audit Logs and in-depth Usage Analytics.
## See how Cinder can help your Trust and Safety teams.

Responsible AI
Platform Integrity
Data Compliance
Turn policies into actionable enforcement in seconds. Minimize time to resolution with AI-driven automations backed by human judgement. Track, audit, and quality-check every decision. All without filing a single engineering ticket.No more toggling between tabs, spreadsheets, and apps. No more SQL. No more guesswork.One integrated platform to power your business.
## Integrated, Accountable, and Intelligent Decision Making
Modern enterprises use massive amounts of data that integrate human and automated decisions. Cinder streamlines the entire process to ensure the consistency, accuracy, and safety of mission-critical decisions to drive your product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bcc76deb3d0a0531bdc65_cog.svg)
Cross-functional Solutions
Keeping data clean, organized, and actionable is essential to effectiveness. Cinder's flexible schema, intuitive policies, and configurable automations align your mission, your data, and your decision making. Trigger enforcement actions for Trust & Safety, fine-tune a model, or do both simultaneously.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bcc76f3eee51a7d759fab_limited.svg)
AI Enhanced Workflows
Modern content moderation requires putting your workflows on a single pane of glass. Cinder integrates human and automated processes to build, test, and manage complex workflows that require AI speed and scale balanced with human judgment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bcc7686ab236205a8e259_inef.svg)
Across The Board Accountability
Whether it's assessing human-in-the-loop AI deployments, managing review teams, or preparing regulatory documentation, Cinder offers a complete suite of tactical, operational, and strategic data to ensure compliance and accountability.
CAPABILITIES
## Manage All Your Workflows in One Platform
Point solutions isolate data and processes in disparate tools. Cinder integrates your workflows in a single source of truth. Manage policies, data labeling, and AI-backed automations all in Cinder.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Reduce inefficiency by simplifying your toolset. Centralize your operations into one platform for context-informed decisions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Alignment between automated systems and human decisions are critical to the complexity of safety at scale. Cinder lets you build and deploy combined workflows in minutes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Integrated operations means integrated output data. Track volumes, accuracy, and effectiveness in real-time - and get compliance data for free as you do so.
CAPABILITIES
## Instantly Adapt to New Risks and Opportunities
Update work streams without overloading engineering. Trust at the speed of innovation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Threat actors adapt. Don't fall behind. Build and deploy new policies, workflows, and queues without a single line of code, because safety does not wait for bureaucracy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
New product UI? No problem. Update schema, renderers for human review, and automations in moments. Cinder lets you move at the speed of the market.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Empower engineering to ship more product. Use data labeled in Cinder to build better AI and design for stronger security—all without losing focus on the bottom line.
Capabilities
## Make Smarter Decisions with Integrated Data
Transform engineering with real-time data from Cinder to drive strategic Trust & Safety implementations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Cinder's API for Trust and Safety data provides a powerful tool for engineering teams to build new detection models, innovate better interventions, and drive product development.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Seamlessly connect into third-party AI tools, use your own models, or easily develop new models in Cinder. Harness data curated in real-time to benchmark your models, constantly improve, and iterate.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e71c3d7de072235ad2_list-dot.svg)
Quality control is central to product development and monitoring. Benchmark AI performance and human labelers in real-time to stay on time and on target.
## Built for security, scale, and flexible control. Cinder is designed to protect Trust and Safety's most sensitive data. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e78a36407534ea4de4_soc%202.svg)
soc 2 type II 
Cinder's data security controls support Trust and Safety teams at advanced AI labs, marketplaces, and content platforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e5f0e2bb267b7506ca_sso.svg)
Robust Access Management
Integrate Cinder with your existing SSO, including support for Okta, Azure AD, OpenID and other protocols. Customizable permissions regulate access to sensitive data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e5e77100ec0eb35b71_self.svg)
cloud Native
Run Cinder as SaaS that scales with your needs. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/659bc2b8e77100ec0e8dff5f/659bf7e501bf1b25b219be7b_audit.svg)
audit logs
Audit and understand how your team uses Cinder with built-in Audit Logs and in-depth Usage Analytics.
## See how Cinder can help your Trust and Safety teams.

generated_description:
Cinder is a company that's tackling one of the most pressing issues in the digital age: online safety and responsible AI. Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W22, this Washington, DC-based startup has quickly carved out its niche in the world of SaaS, providing a comprehensive platform for content moderation, trust and safety, and data labeling.

Their mission? To empower organizations of all sizes—from scrappy startups to established enterprises—to create safer online spaces. In a landscape where the stakes are getting higher daily, Cinder acts as a sort of operating system for digital safety. By automating processes and providing end-to-end capabilities, Cinder helps businesses mitigate harm, investigate abuses, and achieve reliable AI outcomes with confidence.

At the core of Cinder's offering is an integrated platform that eliminates the chaos often associated with managing safety protocols. Gone are the days of switching between multiple apps and dealing with spreadsheets—Cinder seeks to pull everything into a unified workflow where companies can track policies, enforce compliance, and harness valuable data seamlessly.

The company is already seeing traction across diverse sectors, serving clients that range from frontier AI labs to e-commerce giants and social media platforms. Notable users include OpenAI and Patreon, which reflects Cinder's growing reputation in the trust and safety arena.

With a team of about 20 talented individuals and backed by a notable figure like Michael Seibel as Group Partner at Y Combinator, Cinder is equipped to push forward in an ever-evolving market. Their capabilities span from real-time data compliance to AI-enhanced workflows, ensuring that businesses remain adaptable in the face of emerging risks.

For anyone interested in responsible AI, data compliance, or just ensuring a safer digital environment, Cinder is a company worth keeping your eye on. You can learn more about them on their website: [Cinder](http://www.cinder.co).
